$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'accordion_section'.

Parameters:
$ProcessingString - Processing string.
$Changed - Was the processing completed.
Returns:
array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 188 of file jquery.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
                                                $ProcessingString , 'accordion_section' , array( 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );

                              $Code = '<h3><a href="#">{lang:'.$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' ).'}</a></h3>';
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{accordion_section:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {

Definition at line 595 of file jquery.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'add_opener' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );

                              $AddOpenerScript = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/add_opener.tpl' );
                              
                              $AddOpenerScript = str_replace( '{selector}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' ) , $AddOpenerScript );
                              $AddOpenerScript = str_replace( '{before_open_validation}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'before_open_validation' , 'nop' ) , $AddOpenerScript );
                              $AddOpenerScript = str_replace( '{opener}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'opener' , 'unexisting_opener' ) , $AddOpenerScript );
                              
                              $AddOpenerScript = str_replace( '{data_source}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_source' , '' ) , $AddOpenerScript );
                              $AddOpenerScript = str_replace( '{data_acceptor}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_acceptor' , '' ) , $AddOpenerScript );
                              $AddOpenerScript = str_replace( '{status_acceptor}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'status_acceptor' , '' ) , $AddOpenerScript );
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{add_opener:$MacroParameters}" , $AddOpenerScript , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

Definition at line 700 of file jquery.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'add_tab' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              $Tab = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/add_tab.tpl' );

                              $Tab = str_replace( '{id}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' , '' ) ) , $Tab );
                              $Tab = str_replace( '{content_id}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'content_id' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'content_selector' , '' ) ) , $Tab );
                              $Tab = str_replace( '{title}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' , 'title' ) , $Tab );
                              $Tab = str_replace( '{index}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'index' , -1 ) , $Tab );
                              if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'closable' , false ) )
                              {
                                    $Tab = str_replace( '{closable}' , 'true' , $Tab );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Tab = str_replace( '{closable}' , 'false' , $Tab );
                              }
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{add_tab:$MacroParameters}" , $Tab , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 527 of file jquery.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'dialog' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );

                              $DialogInitScript = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/dialog_init.tpl' );
                              
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{selector}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{title}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' , '' ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{width}' , intval( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'width' , '480' ) ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{height}' , intval( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'height' , '320' ) ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{modal}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'modal' , 'true' ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{auto_open}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'auto_open' , 'false' ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{resizable}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'resizable' , 'true' ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{ok_processor}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'ok_processor' , '' ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{cancel_processor}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'cancel_processor' , '' ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{cancel}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'cancel' , 'false' ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              $DialogInitScript = str_replace( '{on_open}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'on_open' , 'nop()' ) , $DialogInitScript );
                              
                              if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'opener' , false ) && $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'opener' ) != '' )
                              {
                                    $DataSource = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_source' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' ) );
                                    $DataAcceptor = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_acceptor' , '' );
                                    $StatusAcceptor = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'status_acceptor' , '' );
                                    $DialogInitScript .= "{add_opener:data_source=$DataSource;data_acceptor=$DataAcceptor;status_acceptor=$StatusAcceptor;before_open_validation=".$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'before_open_validation' , 'nop' ).';opener='.$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'opener' ).';selector='.$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' ).'}';
                              }
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{dialog:$MacroParameters}" , $DialogInitScript , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'iframe_dialog' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
                              $ViewDialogScript = '<div id="'.$id.'"></div>{dialog:on_open=ultimix.IframeDialogOnOpen( \''.$id.'\' );before_open_validation=function()[lfb]return(ultimix.IframeDialogInit( \''.$id.'\' , \''.$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'href' , '/' ).'\' ) )[rfb];selector=#'.$id.';'.$this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().'}';
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{iframe_dialog:$MacroParameters}" , $ViewDialogScript , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;

$ProcessingString - Processing string.
$Changed - Was the processing completed.
Returns:
array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:

Definition at line 327 of file jquery.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'select_dialog' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $DataSource = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_source' , md5( rand().microtime( true ) ) );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'data_source' , $DataSource );
                              
                              $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'id' , $id );
                              
                              $ViewDialogScript = '{select_dialog_content:'.$this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().'}{dialog:selector=#'.$id.';'.$this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().';cancel=true;ok_processor=ultimix.ExtractSimpleSelectResult}';
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{select_dialog:$MacroParameters}" , $ViewDialogScript , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

process_select_dialog_content ( $  ProcessingString,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'select_dialog_content'.

Parameters:
$ProcessingString - Processing string.
$Changed - Was the processing completed.
Returns:
array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 237 of file jquery.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'select_dialog_content' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $PackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
                              $PackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
                              $FunctionName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'access_function_name' , 'simple_select' );
                              
                              $Package = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
                              
                              if( method_exists( $Package , $FunctionName ) )
                              {
                                    $Records = call_user_func( array( $Package , $FunctionName ) );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    throw( new Exception( "Function '$FunctionName' does not exists in the package '$PackageName'" ) );
                              }
                              
                              $SimpleRecords = '';
                              $SimpleIds = '';
                              $DataSource = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_source' , md5( $PackageName.microtime( true ) ) );
                              $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , $DataSource );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'data_source' , $DataSource );

                              $Checked = 'checked';
                              foreach( $Records as $k => $v )
                              {
                                    $Tmp = '<div style="height: 20px; white-space:nowrap; overflow: hidden;"><input style="vertical-align: baseline; display: inline;" '.$Checked.' type="radio" name="'.$Name.'" value="'.get_field( $v , 'id' ).'" id="'.$DataSource.get_field( $v , 'id' ).'">';
                                    $SimpleRecords .= $Tmp.'<label style="margin-left: 2px; vertical-align: 3px; cursor: pointer; white-space:nowrap;" for="'.$DataSource.get_field( $v , 'id' ).'">'.get_field( $v , 'title' ).'</label></div>';
                                    $Checked = '';
                              }
                              
                              $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
                              
                              $Type = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'type' , 'simple' );
                              if( $Type == 'simple' )
                              {
                                    $ViewDialogScript = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/simple_select_dialog.tpl' );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $ViewDialogScript = '';
                              }
                              
                              $ViewDialogScript = str_replace( '{id}' , $id , $ViewDialogScript );
                              $ViewDialogScript = str_replace( '{records}' , $SimpleRecords , $ViewDialogScript );
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{select_dialog_content:$MacroParameters}" , $ViewDialogScript , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $Options->get_setting( 'tab_control' , '0' ) == '1' )
                        {
                              $Changed = false;
                              
                              return( $this->process_string( $Options , '{tab_control:id='.$Options->get_setting( 'id' , $Options->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) ) ).'}' , $Changed ) );
                        }
